name: Azerbaijani Music
description: Music of the Azerbaijani people, who inhabit the modern day country of Azerbaijan, along with a significant population in the neighboring country of Iran.

children.name: Azerbaijani Mugham
children.description: Highly improvisational form of modal music characterized by the singing style and the themes of Azerbaijanâ€™s history.

children.name: Jazz Mugham
children.description: Combines Jazz with elements of Azerbaijani Mugham, featuring jazz-inspired instrumental compositions, improvisations, wind and vocal elements, as well as modal scales and ornamentation techniques for emotional depth.

children.name: Symphonic Mugham
children.description: Introduces elements of Azerbaijani Mugham into the structure of the composition, played on a full western orchestra.
